ygData.subject: Re: New Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Skewers just aren t fun. I was having the same problem and just switched to lanterns. My skill started going up frequently and I also get some return on my
ygData.messageBody:
Skewers just aren't fun. I was having the same problem and just switched to
lanterns. My skill started going up frequently and I also get some return on my
money for smithing. According to the posts I got back today, lanterns will take
you to 68 skill so .... why not do lanterns instead of skewers until you hit 68?

By the way Grak, how was the pottery skill? I heard a master potter telling me
he was quite profitable now and had been since about 75 in skill or so.

-Rosmorte


Software hound wrote:

> From: Software hound <softwarehound@...>
>
> I have found that it took me at least 10 skewers to get 1 point of skill.
> One time I went through 3 backpacks of skewers and did not get one point.
> Then on my next run I got 3 points in 3 tries =) I am a master in 3 trade
> skill now, and smithing is by FAR the hardest to get up. If I had to make a
> choice I would not learn to smith again.
>
> Grak The Troll
